content:
Hi everyone,

Does anyone of you know whether there is an option to generate the IG in any other language than English or whether this was even considered as an option down the road?

Thanks,

Ross
timely question. I'm planning to have this fully supported by May. We'll be able to produce guides in another language, or guides in many languages.
anyone who is interested in helping out with test cases, PM me directly and I'll add you to the list (once we have a list, whereever it might be)
